thread.title: Kim Jong Un invites South Korean leader for talks

title: Kim Jong Un invites South Korean leader for talks
text:
Kim Jong Un invites South Korean leader for talks 11:27am GMT - 01:53 
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un invited South Korean President Moon Jae-in to Pyongyang “at an early date”, South Korean officials said on Saturday. It could set up the first meeting of Korean leaders in more than 10 years. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un invited South Korean President Moon Jae-in to Pyongyang “at an early date”, South Korean officials said on Saturday. It could set up the first meeting of Korean leaders in more than 10 years.
